title: I enjoyed it
review: It is a nice movie, i loved the cast. I laughed most of the time. I'm glad to see Peruvian films like this.

title: Enjoyable and quite funny at times ..
review:
The plot is not that original but it is funny had a different environment ,, people in Peru all in Spanish ,, i really liked it ,, it gave a new sense of cultural style ... The script is simple, familiar and has more than few funny lines .

The casting was good,, Gisela Ponce de Le√≥n was really funny ,, reminds me of "Nia Vardalos" from "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" ,, and the whole cast looked fine.

Recommended .

title: Really love it form the beginning
review:
It is like the kind of movie you can watch all by yourself after a breakup or just with your friends. It's funny, acurate personally. The cast was really cool. I was picturing myself with Fe. Lol. Besides that I think it was a great movie to entertained.

You better not be picky with it.
